DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to Evaluate and Compare Safety and Pharmacokinetic of the Eperisone HCl SR and Myonal in healthy Korean male adults.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Compare the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Eperisone HCl SR Tablet 75mg and Myonal Tablet 50mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects age between 20 and 55 singed informed consent Hypotension or hypertension has a history of allergy reaction of this drug or other drugs
